items.name: Teen Wolf Fanon Wiki
items.title: Teen Wolf Fanon Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Teen Wolf Fanon Wiki
items.desc: The Teen Wolf Fanon Wiki is a Wiki for Teen Wolf Fans and Fanfiction creators to explore universe of the series. Teen Wolf follows Scott McCall, who is bitten by The Alpha and turns into a werewolf. He then must learn how to balance being a werewolf with his normal life, including his love interest, Allison. We encourage you to contribute your own writing!
